org.forgerock.openidm.scheduler

Class PersistedScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openidm.scheduler.PersistedScheduler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Scheduler

    public class PersistedScheduler
extends Object
    Creates a scheduler that is persisted to the OpenIDM repo.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

        public org.forgerock.json.JsonValue getCurrentlyExecutingJobs()
                                                       throws org.quartz.SchedulerException,
                                                              IOException
        Description copied from interface: Scheduler
        Gets the currently executing jobs. Note that this method is not cluster aware and will only return the running jobs for the instance this method was invoked on.
        Specified by:
        getCurrentlyExecutingJobs in interface Scheduler
        Returns:
        a JsonValue list of the currently executing jobs
        Throws:
        org.quartz.SchedulerException - if unable to get the list of currently executing jobs
